meta.description: Our neural networks simulate internal physics of pumps and electric motors in real-time. We detect problems months in advance with 99% accuracy and save millions from unplanned downtime.

hero.title: Uninterrupted Production
hero.description: Our neural networks simulate internal physics of centrifugal pumps and electric motors in real-time. We detect problems months in advance with 99% accuracy and save millions from unplanned downtime.

about.title: How it works
about.description: Our proprietary physics model takes real-time sensor data and solves complex fluid dynamics and electromagnetic equations happening inside the machine. This allows us to see internal defects that standard tools miss.

cavitation.title: Virtual Cavitation Index
cavitation.description: Current operating conditions show safe cavitation levels

stress.title: Impeller Stress Analysis
stress.description: Stress levels within safe operating limits

hydraulic.title: Hydraulic Thrust
hydraulic.description: Operating at 88% of rated hydraulic capacity

rotor.title: Rotor Bar Health
rotor.description: All rotor bars in excellent condition

winding.title: Winding Temperature
winding.description: Winding temperature well within safe limits

cavitation.title: Virtual Cavitation Index
cavitation.description: Cavitation is the formation of vapor bubbles in a liquid due to low pressure. These later implode and cause damage.

bep.title: Best Efficiency Point
bep.description: A pump has a specific efficiency curve (Head vs. Flow). The Best Efficiency Point is the peak of that curve.

npsh.title: Net Positive Suction Head
npsh.description: This is the pressure available at the suction pipe to prevent the cavitation that later causes damage.

stress.title: Impeller Stress Heatmap
stress.description: This shows the mechanical stress on the metal vanes caused by water pressure.

hydraulic.title: Hydraulic Load
hydraulic.description: Shows axial and radial forces acting on pump shaft. This is critical for preventing bearing failure.

imbalance.title: Current Imbalance
imbalance.description: If Phase A draws 100 Amps and Phase B draws 105 Amps, the motor overheats.

rotor.title: Rotor Bar Health
rotor.description: In AC Induction motors, the internal bars can crack. This creates a specific vibration frequency.

efficiency.title: Motor Efficiency Curve
efficiency.description: Motors have a Torque vs. Efficiency curve. They are usually best at 75-100% load.

winding.title: Winding Temperature
winding.description: Our neural networks estimate the temperature inside the copper coils based on current and resistance.

torque.title: Output Torque
torque.description: Measures rotational force delivered by the motor shaft and ensures the motor operates within capacity.

vibration.title: Vibration RMS
vibration.description: Used to detect imbalances, misalignments, loose mountings, and electric or hydraulic flow issues.

temperature.title: Temperature Trends
temperature.description: Critical for winding insulation in motors and bearings in pumps. Every 10°C rise cuts insulation life in half.

rul.title: Remaining Useful Life
rul.description: Predicts when the insulation or bearings will seize in motors and when the seal or impeller will degrade in pumps.

integration.title: Works with the tools you already use
integration.description: Our API automatically feeds predictive health metrics into SAP, Maximo, or Ignition, triggering maintenance tickets the moment a risk is detected.

hero.title: Elite Fraud Detection for Mid-sized Banks
hero.description: We provide mid-sized banks the advanced Graph technology that the larger banks use for just 10% of the cost. We identify mule network schemes, ATO, and reduce the false positives costing you millions by up to 50%.

graph.title: How it works
graph.description: Our proprietary graph technology models your entire network. Nodes represent entities (customers, accounts, devices) and Edges represent transaction attributes (IP address, amount). Mapping the entire relationship between nodes and edges allows us to understand the context of each transaction, minimizing false positives and finding the real fraud.

integration.title: Plug-and-play with your ecosystem
integration.description: Keep your current setup, just make it smarter. Our API connects directly to your data streams and monitoring dashboards without disrupting workflow.

value.title: 2x Speed at 10% cost
value.subtitle: We focus exclusively on providing mid-sized banks with the advanced graph AI technology that is currently mostly only available to large banks. This allows us to provide 90% of the benefit at 10% of the cost. We integrate fast and easy with your current setup and stop fraud 2x faster where it's hurting you the most.

refund.title: Refund Liability
refund.description: We understand how much time and money refunds are costing you every year. Our technology will significantly reduce Account takeovers and APP Fraud, saving you millions every year and making your customers happy.

falsePositives.title: False Positives
falsePositives.description: By understanding the network, we verify legitimate high-velocity users like small businesses that rule-based systems often block. We see that the recipient is a friend of a friend (2-hop connection) and suppress the alert.

aml.title: AML Compliance
aml.description: Graph Neural Networks are the absolute best technology in the world to catch mule network schemes. You will be able to detect money laundering faster and more accurately than any KYC technology can.

hero.title: PROTAC Linkers. Fast and Synthesizable
hero.description: We build Graph Neural Networks strictly constrained to Enamine building blocks and valid reactions to provide midsized biotechs with synthesizable linkers that form stable, cooperative ternary complexes.

animation.title: How it works
animation.description: No infrastructure costs, no loss of IP, and no $200K + equity hires. We work with you project-based and build you a customized model. We'll simulate millions of ternary complexes to identify the few synthesizable linkers that drive cooperativity, saving you weeks of synthesis time and thousands in reagents.

value.title: Speed & Accuracy
value.subtitle: No more trial and error linker scanning. Our architecture is strictly constrained to valid chemical reactions and available fragments, delivering linkers that are not just predicted to bind, but guaranteed to be synthesizable.

reaction-based.title: Reaction Based
reaction-based.description: Our model creates linkers by selecting Enamine REAL fragments and valid reaction types (Amide Coupling, CuAAC). Every output comes with a synthetic recipe, not just a structure.

hook.title: Hook Effect
hook.description: We actively optimize for Cooperativity (α > 1) to maximize stability while minimizing binary complex formation, reducing the risk of the hook effect at high concentrations.

rigid.title: Rigid Scaffold
rigid.description: Floppy PEG chains degrade upon binding. Our model is trained to find rigid scaffolds (piperazines, spirocycles) that lock the proteins into a productive degradation geometry.

scoring.title: Geometric + PPI Scoring
scoring.description: We don't rely on simple docking scores. We screen millions of candidates with Smina/Vina for geometric fit, then validate top hits with PPI scoring to ensure genuine interface stability.

permeability.title: Permeability
permeability.description: Long linkers often kill cell permeability. We penalize high Molecular Weight and TPSA to generate linkers that can form intramolecular hydrogen bonds to cross cell membranes.

integration.title: Compatible with your Lab Stack
integration.description: Our API connects directly to your existing Electronic Lab Notebooks and cloud data lakes, enhancing your current workflow with state of the art technology.

hero.title: Solid-Electrolyte Interface Simulation
hero.description: We help Solid State Battery startups reach manufacturability faster. Our physics informed neural networks predict when and how dendrites will form by simulating ion transport and mechanical stress over hundreds of cycles.

animation.title: How it works
animation.description: No infrastructure costs, no loss of IP, and no $200K + equity hires. We work with you project-based and build you a custom Physics Model, on-premise if needed. We'll debug variances and figure out how to make your battery manufacturable.

value.title: Speed & Accuracy
value.subtitle: DFT is accurate but limited to nanoseconds. Our neural networks simulate the entire charge/discharge cycle and the degradation over hundreds of cycles in just hours while strictly constraining the model to the laws of physics.

batch.title: Smarter Batches
batch.description: A single failed validation cycle may cost up to 3 months and $100k+ in burn. We identify potential failures digitally in days.

capex.title: Ultra Light Deployment
capex.description: Access a dedicated AI Research team for a project-based fee. No $200k hires, no equity, no infrastructure buildup.

explainable.title: Explainable AI
explainable.description: Our models are constrained by the laws of Thermodynamics and Mechanics. They cannot hallucinate impossible physics.

acc-speed.title: Long-term Accuracy
acc-speed.description: DFT is accurate but limited to nanoseconds. Standard ML is fast but hallucinates. Our PINNs are capable of simulating ion transport and mechanical stress over relevant timescales.

data.title: Data Efficient
data.description: Our models need Big Physics, not Big Data. By embedding physical constraints directly into the neural network, we get high quality results even with only limited data.

integration.title: Fully Private and Customized
integration.description: We understand how important your IP is. We make our models on private cloud instances and even do fully isolated on-premise deployments. We'll also build you a custom dashboard where you can run your own tests.
